DOC.brief_summary: In order determine norm value skeleton muscle disassembly due physical exertion healthy trained population , develop prediction test approval rhabdomyolysis injury return duty , 50 healthy subject undergo series different physical test .
DOC.brief_title: Exertional Rhabdomyolysis- Characterization Prediction Tests Return Duty
DOC.detailed_description: 50 healthy civilian volunteer recruit study . Each subject undergo physical test : anthropometric measurement , wingate test , VO2max test , step test run anaerobic threshold , separate day . Blood sample , lactic acid level ( measure blood drop - finger sting ) urine sample take every test .
DOC.criteria: healthy civilian age 1830. average aerobic anaerobic fitness . Without heart , cardiovascular , metabolic respiratory illness . Without know medical illness medication use might endanger participant . existence undesired condition detail inclusion criterion . physician decision .
